title: Why did Yasuo switch to Progressive?

replies.body: He needed more...?

> [{quoted}](name=Tempura King,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=nG3tUNR3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-14T01:49:02.955+0000)
>
> He needed more...?

Flow. (Or Flo in this case.)
Yea I saw the flo but... oh... wind... flows...

Flow is the term for his resource. He needed more of it. 

Now the joke is dead.
Sorry for killing the joke, but it'll respawn in 2 mins dw.

Is that his kda?
Yasuojoke was the IGN. Yeah, his KDA was pretty bad. He was worth a cannon minion by 15 minutes.
what a bad yasuo
There's no such thing as a "good" Yasuo. I hate them all.
But could he beat the 15-16 lakers?

> [{quoted}](name=Tempura King,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=nG3tUNR3,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-14T03:32:14.018+0000)

by any chance, you don't refer to the Tempura Wizards of Kid Icarus, do you?
Not a reference to that, I just like eating tempura. I know bout that game though and the tempura bombs.
"Death is like the wind. Always by my side."

> Flow is the term for his resource. He needed more of it. 

Resource
*Resource*

http://imgur.com/5vdtAFc

"Resource"

> [{quoted}](name=Tempura King,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=nG3tUNR3,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-03-14T02:00:33.216+0000)
>
> Yea I saw the flo but... oh... wind... flows...

His shield is literally called flow.
Oh, that's what the silver thing's called, thanks for sharing.

its not a loose association...its a direct correlation with his passive.

_RESOLVE: Yasuo generates 1% of his maximum **Flow** for every 59 / 52 / 46 units he travels by any means, requiring a total of 5900 / 5200 / 4600 units travelled to obtain maximum **Flow**. At maximum **Flow**, the next instance of champion or monster damage against Yasuo consumes all of his **Flow** and shields him for 100 - 510 (based on level) damage for up to 1 second._
Her name is Flo from Progressive.

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/0/08/Aurelion_Sol_OriginalLoading.jpg/revision/latest/window-crop/width/130/x-offset/0/y-offset/7/window-width/308/window-height/272?cb=20160308214328 I sensed a great disturbance in the Puniverse...
is this an advertisement
Goddammit
Get out
I THOUGHT THIS WAS ABOUT THE GENRE T_T
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
His special resource is called flow.
